籤詩版本二:
Amalangabi ashisayo afinyelela esibhakabhakeni, futhi i-lotus ikhula emalangabini omlilo
Ekugcineni izophumelela futhi ngeke idale umonakalo.
詩意:
Le hexagram ifana ne-lotus ekhula emlilweni.
Konke kubonakala kuyingozi kodwa akuyona ingozi.
解曰: Nakuba esengozini. Akukho monakalo emzimbeni wakhe. Ukuziphilisa. Bonke bahlangana nabantu abahloniphekile.
籤詩故事一:
◇Fire Gourd Valley
Ngesikhathi seMibuso Emithathu, uLiu Bei noZhou Yu bahlasela uCao Cao ngokuhlanganyela. U-Kong Ming wamisa inkundla enezinkanyezi eziyisikhombisa ukuze akhulekele umoya wasempumalanga futhi wasiza uZhou Yu ukuba ashise iRed Cliff. Ibutho likaCao Cao lashiswa labaleka ngenxa yokwethuka. UCao Cao wabaleka nebutho elinqotshiwe.
Ojenene beqembu laseKongming baqamekela yonke indawo.
U-Cao Cao waya emlonyeni we-Hulu Valley ukuze aphumule futhi apheke. Ebona ukuthi le ndawo iyingozi futhi akukho ukucasha, wahleka.
Kusenjalo wezwa umsindo wenganono futhi uZhang Fei weza ezombulala.
Kwaqubuka imililo yonke indawo esigodini, futhi ibutho likaCao Cao lazabalaza, uCao Cao wagibela ihhashi lakhe wabaleka ngenxa yokwesaba emlilweni.
Hlula futhi uye ku-Huarong Road.
(Nakuba esengozini, usengasindisa impilo yakhe.)
聖意: Ikhaya alikho esimeni esihle.Qaphela ukufuna ingcebo, izisebenzi, ukuhweba, umshado wesikhohlakali, vimbela uLiujia, ukwethusa abahamba ngezinyawo, ama-hinder fields, iminyundu kasilika, imfuyo eyisithupha yonakele, abantu bayalandelelwa, amacala omphakathi asentshonalanga alahlekile, ukufuduka. iyalondoloza, izinto ezilahlekile ziyalahleka, izifo ziyamiswa, zithunyelwe ezintabeni namathuna ayalungiswa.
